author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Twenty-Seven! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Our own MALEV is as always spitting out games they way he spits out rhymes, this time with CONVICT COMBAT. A little bit Chronicles of Riddick, a little bit BAKI, a little bit LOCKOUT, this game pits you against the BADDIES of an insane prison as you fight to survive and progress to escape. This ZINE scale micro game is only $3 on Itch, so if you're looking for a level battler for solo play you're in a good spot. Let's dive in!

Check out the this super-cheap ITCH Beta with printable Accessories HERE: https://malev-da-shinobi.itch.io/convictcombat
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 027 -CONVICT COMBAT by MALEV
